channel.title: Gexf on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Gexf on Mark Needham

item.title: Visualising a neo4j graph using gephi
item.description: At ThoughtWorks we don’t have line managers but people can choose to have a sponsor - typically someone who has worked in the company for longer/has more experience in the industry than them - who can help them navigate the organisation better. From hearing people talk about sponsors over the last 6 years it seemed like quite a few people sponsored the majority and there were probably a few people who didn’t have a sponsor.
